text:
Trulia | San Francisco, CA | http://trulia.com/

Our mortgage team is in need of a top notch, Sr-level JavaScript engineer. We're working with Backbone.js, Require.js, Node.js (Rendr/Express), and currently experimenting with React.

We're a very small team, but have highest impact across all of Zillow Group (Zillow, Trulia, HotPads, StreetEasy, and more), and we think big and move fast.

Apply here: https://boards.greenhouse.io/trulia/jobs/63558#.VZQjExNViko

Or email me tpae[at]trulia.com
